Pre-Game Insights: South Africa thrashed defending champions England in their previous match
South Africa will look to build on their superlative performance against Bangladesh
Taking the foot off the pedal at this stage could spell trouble for South Africa
Others: In their four meetings so far in World Cups — 2007, 2011, 2015 and 2019 — South Africa has lost to Bangladesh twice — 2007 and 2019
